I1.name: Hextech Munitions
description: {{sbc|Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells:}} '''Corki's''' [[basic attack]]s are modified to deal {{as|80% AD}} {{as|magic damage}} and {{as|20% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}.

{{sbc|Innate - The Package:}} After {{sbc|10:00}}, ''{{ai|The Package|Corki}}'' is delivered to both corners of the allied [[Spawn|fountain]], which can be selected by '''Corki''' to pick up after {{tip|channel|channeling}} for 1 second. Upon completion of the channel, '''Corki''' gains one cast of {{ai|Special Delivery|Corki}} for 60 seconds, replacing {{ai|Valkyrie|Corki}} for the duration. While holding the ''{{ai|The Package|Corki}}'', '''Corki''' receives {{sti|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} [[out of combat]] and {{tip|ghost|ghosting}}.
'''Corki''' cannot pick up the package while he is unable to cast abilities.
I1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells: Corki's basic attacks are modified to deal 80% AD magic damage and 20% AD physical damage.
Innate - The Package: After 10:00, Corki's The Package is delivered to both corners of the allied Spawn, which can be selected by Corki to pick up after channeling for 1 second. Upon completion of the channel, Corki gains one cast of Corki's Special Delivery for 60 seconds, replacing Corki's Valkyrie for the duration. While holding the Corki's The Package, Corki receives 40% bonus movement speed out of combat and ghosting.
Corki cannot pick up the package while he is unable to cast abilities.
I1.notes:
* The mixed damage is dealt in two simultaneous instances of damage, but will pretend to be a single instance for most effects (such as {{ris|Conqueror}} stacks). ** The {{as|magic damage}} is dealt in an instance before the {{as|physical damage}}. ** Both instances deal {{tip|basic damage}} and thus natively apply {{sti|life steal}}. ** The attack applies [[on-hit]] effects only once, right at the start. ** Even if the target dies from the {{as|magic damage}}, the {{as|physical damage}} will still be applied to it. *** If the target dies from [[on-hit]] damage, the magic damage portion will be skipped and only the physical damage applied.{{bug}} ** {{nie|Spellblade}} damage is special cased to be converted to {{as|magic damage}}. ** The damage from {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} is affected by ''Hextech Munitions' ''modifier. * {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} amplify the damage as usual, multiplying both instances of damage.
* All players are alerted by '''Corki''' emitting a global siren upon picking up ''The Package''. * '''Corki''' can pick up the package even if he does not have a [[Experience (champion)|skill point]] in {{ai|Valkyrie|Corki}}. * The following table refers for interactions while '''Corki''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}: {{ct|channel|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts}}

Q.name: Phosphorus Bomb
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' launches a bomb at the target location that explodes upon impact, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
The bomb also grants {{tip|sight}} of the area and {{tip|standard sight|reveals}} enemy {{tip|champions}} hit for 6 seconds.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Corki launches a bomb at the target location that explodes upon impact, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
The bomb also grants sight of the area and reveals enemy champions hit for 6 seconds.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 70% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)

W1.name: Valkyrie
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, dropping bombs that leave up to 3 blazing patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled, lasting for 2 seconds.
Enemies within the patches are dealt {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
''{{ai|Gatling Gun|Corki}} can be cast during the dash. Valkyrie will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
W1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Corki dashes to the target location, dropping bombs that leave up to 3 blazing patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled, lasting for 2 seconds.
Enemies within the patches are dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds.
Corki's Gatling Gun can be cast during the dash. Valkyrie will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|15 to 45}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|15*8 to 45*8}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 10% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 80% AP)

W2.name: Special Delivery
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' {{tip|dashes}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} to the target location, {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} all enemies in his path 500 units and leaving behind a trail of fire for 5 seconds, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the area for its duration and for 3 seconds afterwards.

Enemies hit by '''Corki's''' dash or within the trail are burned and {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% for 2 seconds, refreshing every {{fd|0.25}} seconds while inside the area. The burn deals {{pp|7.5 to 7.5 for 7; then + 1.25*x for 8; then + 2.5*x|formula=static 7.5 until lvl 7; then+1.25 until lvl 15, then+2.5|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 6% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
''Special Delivery will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
W2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Corki dashes with displacement immunity to the target location, knocking aside all enemies in his path 500 units and leaving behind a trail of fire for 5 seconds, which grants sight of the area for its duration and for 3 seconds afterwards.
Enemies hit by Corki's dash or within the trail are burned and slowed by 90% for 2 seconds, refreshing every 0.25 seconds while inside the area. The burn deals 7.5 âˆ’ 7.5 for 7; then + 1.25*x for 8; then + 2.5*x (based on level) (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 6% AP) magic damage every 0.25 seconds.
Casting Special Delivery instantly resets Corki's Valkyrie cooldown.
Special Delivery will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
W2.notes: * Enemies that stay within the trail for its entire duration are dealt {{pp|(7.5 to 7.5)*7*4 for 7;then + 1.25*x*28 for 8;then +2.5*x*28|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50*28}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6*28}}% AP)}} {{as|'''total''' magic damage}}.

E.name: Gatling Gun
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' sprays bullets in a frontal cone for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage every {{fd|0.25}} seconds to all enemies hit, and reducing the targets' {{sti|lethality|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} with each tick, stacking up to 8 times and lasting for 2 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent ticks.
E.descriptionHtml: Active: Corki sprays bullets in a frontal cone for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies hit, and reducing the targets' armor and magic resistance with each tick, stacking up to 8 times and lasting for 2 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent ticks.
leveling: {{st|Mixed Damage Per Tick|{{ap|120/16 to 320/16}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|120 to 320}} {{as|(+ 160% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}{{st|Resistance Reduction Per Tick|{{ap|1 to 2.5}}|Total Resistance Reduction|{{ap|1*8 to 2.5*8}}}}
E.notes:
* The direction of the gun firing changes depending on where '''Corki''' is facing.
** '''Corki''' will turn to face in the direction of the cursor upon casting ''Gatling Gun''.
* ''Gatling Gun's'' area of effect can hit closeby enemies next to and behind him, due to hitting {{tip|er|enemy boundary edge}}.

effects.str:
• Mixed Damage Per Tick: (+ 10% bonus AD)
  • Total Mixed Damage: (+ 160% bonus AD)
  • Resistance Reduction Per Tick:
  • Total Resistance Reduction:

R1.name: Missile Barrage
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Corki''' periodically [[stock]]s a missile ammo, up to a maximum of 7, and starts with 7 missile ammo every time he [[Death|respawns]].
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' fires a missile in the target direction that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area.
Every third missile '''Corki''' fires is a ''{{ai|Big One|Corki}}'', dealing 100% increased damage as well as increased range and explosion radius.
R1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Corki periodically stocks a missile ammo, up to a maximum of 7, and starts with 7 missile ammo every time he Death.
Active: Corki fires a missile in the target direction that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area.
Every third missile Corki fires is a Corki's Big One, dealing 100% increased damage as well as increased range and explosion radius.
leveling: {{st|Big One Magic Damage|{{ap|90*2 to 160*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|30 to 150}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
R1.notes:
* Once '''Corki''' has learned the ability, he receives a [[buff]] that automatically tracks the number of times he's used his ultimate since the last ''Big One''.
** Since this information is represented as a buff, this information is available to both allies and enemies.
* '''Corki''' retains progress towards ''The Big One'' when he [[death|dies]].
* Once '''Corki''' has his ultimate, he has an indicator below his health bar that is only visible to him that shows when a ''Big One'' will be fired, how many missiles he has in reserve, and how many more missiles he can [[stock|store]].
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* ''Missile Barrage's'' effect radius is centered around the location of the missile as it collides.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ % AD) (+ 20% AP)
• Big One Magic Damage: (+ % AD) (+ 40% AP)
